name: Deadfall Adventures: Heart of Atlantis
description:
Ready your guns, because the hunt is on. Classic action-adventure story set in exotic locations around the globe – Egypt, Arctic and forgotten ruins of the Maya Inspired by the novels of H. Rider Haggard Levels full of traps, puzzles and hidden treasures Make use of your adventurer-equipment (compass, flashlight, notebook) Singleplayer campaign, plus multiple multiplayer modes: Classic Deathmatch/Team Deathmatch (8 players) Treasure Hunt Mode (2 teams – Max 4 players per team) Co-op Survival Mode (4 players).

1 player
2MB minimum save size
HDTV screen resolution: 720p, 1080i, 1080p
DUALSHOCK®3
Network Features
Network Players 2-8
